[Bet 30]

rounds.response:
I have the nut flush draw (with an ace-high flush) and a pair of tens. The board is fairly coordinated with both a straight and flush possible, but I have a strong ace kicker if my flush comes in. With 950 chips behind, I'd like to build a pot while protecting my draw and extracting value from weaker hands. I'll bet around 3/4 pot to charge draws and hands that might call once.

[Bet 75]
